# NEW Attempt to convert all columns to factor values
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)

# Read the dataset into a variable and convert necessary columns
my_data <- read.csv("AcaciaSaligna_Data.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE) %>%
  mutate(
    Year = as.factor(Year), 
    Vegetation_Type = as.factor(Vegetation_Type)
  )

# Pivot the dataset to long format
long_data <- my_data %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = everything(),   
    names_to = "variable", 
    values_to = "value"
  )

# Check the structure
str(long_data)
